snippet: Why is Moscow blocking efforts at the U.N. to condemn Assad? International commentators find that there's more to Russia's position than meets the eye.
abstract: Why is Moscow blocking efforts at the U.N. to condemn Assad? International commentators find that there's more to Russia's position than meets the eye.
lead_paragraph: As Western powers and much of the Arab world try to persuade Russia and its allies at the U.N. Security Council to condemn the Syrian government, the international commentariat ponders whether there's hope for diplomacy at the United Nations.
